aboutUs.title: Who We Are?
aboutUs.description: Free Minds is a non-profit organization whose primary mission is to provide free resources for every day working people.We believe that practicing meditation everyday can help reduce stress and anxiety and in turn improve overall health.

featureCards.title: Mediation Music
featureCards.description: Access to Free Music to listen to aid in you're meditation.

featureCards.title: Mediation Timer
featureCards.description: A Self paced Meditation Timer that can be adjusted to fit you're busy schedule.

header.title: Take Time to Be Mindful
header.description: Stress and Anxiety play a big role in our every day lives. Take time to relieve that stress
